import React from 'react'; const HeroSection: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Left Section - Text Content */}

Perfect Reality for Your Business

Experience stunning visual clarity with our advanced LED technology. From retail environments to corporate spaces, our displays create immersive experiences that engage and inspire.

{/* Right Section - Visual Display */}
{/* Landscape Display - Lemons and Water */}
{ // Fallback to CSS content if image fails to load const target = e.target as HTMLImageElement; target.style.display = 'none'; target.parentElement!.innerHTML = `
🍋
🌿
💧

Fresh & Dynamic

Vibrant Content

`; }} />
{/* Portrait Display - Wine Bottle */}
{ // Fallback to CSS content if image fails to load const target = e.target as HTMLImageElement; target.style.display = 'none'; target.parentElement!.innerHTML = `
🍷

Elegant Display

Wilker Hills

SAUVIGNON BLANC

`; }} />
); }; export default HeroSection;
